abstract: The $699 Epson EX70 projector has three internal LCDs and projects 2,000 lumens at a widescreen 1,280-by-800-pixel resolution.
snippet: The $699 Epson EX70 projector has three internal LCDs and projects 2,000 lumens at a widescreen 1,280-by-800-pixel resolution.
lead_paragraph: Just like cars, projectors come in all sizes, from HD monsters that take up entire desktops to miniature projectors the size of a pack of cigarettes. The petite $699 Epson EX70 is in the middle.

headline.main: Not Too Big, Not Too Small. A Projector That Is Just the Right Size.
headline.print_headline: Not Too Big, Not Too Small. A Projector That Is Just the Right Size.
